title: Remove transparency from dropdown lists

requirements.text: Remove transparency from all dropdown/select lists throughout the application. All dropdown menus, select popover content, and suspended lists must have a fully opaque background (no transparency or backdrop opacity). This applies to all Select, Popover, DropdownMenu, and similar overlay components used across every page and component in the frontend.

The fix applies consistently across all pages: ReportsListPage, MonthYearSelector, ApprovalsPage, DashboardPage, ActivityFormPage, ReportFormPage, UserManagementPage, and any other page with dropdowns.
The opaque background works correctly in both light and dark themes.
No other UI elements are affected by this change.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not alter any backend logic or data models.
nonGoals: Changing any other visual styles beyond the dropdown/list background opacity.
Adding new features or modifying existing report/export functionality.
